decisions.decision: Use real-time email validation with 300ms debounce, password strength indicator, and clear error states
decisions.rationale: Immediate feedback reduces form abandonment. Debounce prevents excessive validation calls during typing.
accessibility: Focus moves to first error on submit
checklist: Email validated on blur and 300ms debounce

decisions.decision: Two-step confirmation with red CTA, escape to close, focus trap, and explicit action naming
decisions.rationale: Destructive actions need friction. Explicit naming ('Delete Project') prevents accidental clicks on generic 'OK' buttons.
accessibility: Focus returns to trigger on close

decisions.decision: Complete/delete actions update UI immediately with 5-second undo toast
decisions.rationale: ADHD users benefit from immediate feedback. Undo option prevents anxiety about accidental actions.
accessibility: Completed items visually distinct but not removed immediately
checklist: Server sync happens after undo window

decisions.decision: 44px touch target, prominent clear button, search on submit not on type, keyboard dismiss on submit
decisions.rationale: Mobile users need larger touch targets. Search on submit saves bandwidth and gives user control.
checklist: Clear button appears when input has value
Search triggers on Enter/submit, not on type

gaps.notes: Settings page has bare toggles with no feedback. Users don't know if changes are saved.
Table shows blank when loading and when empty. No way to distinguish states.
